instructions: Make sure your modem is connected to a working phone jack or cable connection, either directly or through your router. Swipe in from the right edge of the screen and tap Settings . (If you're using a mouse, point to the upper-right corner of the screen, move the mouse pointer down, and click Settings .) Tap or click Power > Restart . Sign in to Windows, go back to Settings , and see whether your wireless settings are there. If Wi-Fi settings are still missing : Go to Solution 2 . If Wi-Fi settings are visible : Make sure that Wi-Fi is set to On and that your network name appears in the list of available wireless networks. Tap or click your network, and tap or click Connect .
